## PartialTaskData

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/tasks/src/types.ts" sourceLine="75" packageName="@commandkit/tasks" />

Partial task data for creating tasks with optional fields.

Useful when you want to create a task with only some fields specified.

```ts title="Signature"
type PartialTaskData<T extends Record<string, any> = Record<string, any>> = Partial<TaskData<T>>
```
